name: A. Paper Airplanes
statement:
To make a paper airplane, one has to use a rectangular piece of paper.
From a sheet of standard size you can make s airplanes.A group of k
people decided to make n airplanes each. They are going to buy several
packs of paper, each of them containing p sheets, and then distribute
the sheets between the people. Each person should have enough sheets to
make n airplanes. How many packs should they buy?
